member.name: M:ConsoleReadLineTimeOut1.ConsoleHelpers.ReadLineAsStringTimeout(System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan})
member.summary: Wait a specific amount of time for Console.ReadLine. Must press ENTER to collect input or no key to timeout
member.param: Valid time span or if not passed default to in seconds
member.returns: Input from ReadLine or an empty string
